resources.string: This app has been created by some cool people for free. You can see them below.

This app is an open-source project. You can freely use it, modify, share or contribute to the codebase. We also encourage you to donate so developers will be able to buy more coffee to speed up the development process :)

Facebook icon made by Freepic from www.flaticon.com 
Google Play icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com 
Github icon made by Dave Gandy from www.flaticon.com 
Donate icon made by Zlatko Najdenovski from www.flaticon.com
Follow, like and rate Visiting Card!

JBoss Community is a community of open source projects primarily written in Java. JBoss Community is a community of open source projects. The community hosts a large number of projects that are written in various programming languages. The primary language is Java, but there are also projects that are written in Ruby, PHP, Node and other languages. \n \nThe app you\'re currently using is one of such projects.
Currently this project hasn\'t got LICENSE file. When we add it, it\'ll get updated.
